remarks: Multiplication of an NxN matrix with an N-dimensional vector results in an N-dimensional vector.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Dec-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 23-Feb-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mavmulcl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mavmulcl.m $e |- .X. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) $.
mavmulcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mavmulcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mavmulcl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mavmulcl.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mavmulcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` A ) ) $.
mavmulcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( B ^m N ) ) $.
mavmulcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .X. Y ) e. ( B ^m N ) ) $.
